FuncDef: The display issu mode command displays the ISSU mode on the device.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the ISSU mode of a device, run the display issu mode command. Available ISSU modes are process-switchover and board-reset-by-chassis.
The display issu mode command applies only to a cluster scenario.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
